trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Narrows
There were 2 other sightings in Narrows on or around June 14th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsfor a week i have been taking random pictures of the sky over our neighborhood and in almost everyone i capture these round objects hovering in the air some are far away and some are close. i can't see them until i magnify the photo with my zoom after taking the picture. i have at least 8 pictures or more over the past 4 days with these objects in view. in one the objects are in a formation and they are dark on the bottom 3\4 of the sphere and shiny on the top 1\4. i have a few above and below a passing airplane. i also have some that appear to be disk shaped in front of clouds, above clouds , and below them. all seem to be concentrated on this area near the appalachian trail in the background.
Summary: Driving and taking random photos/ufo's hovering in sky
